A. spend the time required to provide, clarify, and elaborate requirements.

It is important for the customer to spend the time required to provide, clarify, and elaborate on the requirements for the solution being developed. This includes providing detailed descriptions of the desired features, functions, and capabilities, as well as any constraints or limitations that need to be taken into account. By taking the time to clearly define and communicate their requirements, the customer can help to ensure that the solution being developed meets their needs and expectations, and that it is aligned with the overall business objectives.
